Class MenuController

java.lang.Object
com.game.controllers.MenuController
public class MenuController extends Object
Controller for managing the main menu and submenus of the game.

This class handles navigation between the main menu, game mode selection, and options screen. It also initializes sound effects for button interactions.

    • MenuController

      public MenuController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed. Sets up hover sound effects for each button.

    • jouer

      public void jouer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event triggered when the "Play" button is clicked. Navigates to the game mode selection screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Play" button.

    • gestionProfils

      public void gestionProfils(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event triggered when the "Profiles" button is clicked. Navigates to the player profiles management screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Profiles" button.

    • optionsMenu

      public void optionsMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event triggered when the "Options" button is clicked. Navigates to the options menu screen.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Options" button.

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Exits the application when the "Quit" button is clicked.

    • classicGame

      public void classicGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event triggered when the "Classic Game" button is clicked. Launches the classic game mode.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Classic Game" button.

    • CptFlag

      public void CptFlag(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event triggered when the "Capture The Flag" button is clicked. Launches the capture the flag game mode.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Capture The Flag" button.

    • VsComputer

      public void VsComputer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event triggered when the "Versus Computer" button is clicked. Launches the game mode where the player plays against the computer.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Versus Computer" button.

    • easyBot

      public void easyBot(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Starts an easy bot game mode.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the "Easy Bot" button

    • mediumBot

      public void mediumBot(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Starts a medium bot game mode.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the "Medium Bot" button

    • hardBot

      public void hardBot(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Starts a hard bot game mode.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the "Hard Bot" button

    • retourChooseGame

      public void retourChooseGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the "Back to Choose Game" button click event. Returns to the game mode selection screen.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the "Back to Choose Game" button

    • LevelEditor

      public void LevelEditor(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event triggered when the "Level Editor" button is clicked. Launches the level editor to create custom map
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Level Editor" button.

    • retourMenu

      public void retourMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action event triggered when the "Back to Menu" button is clicked. Returns to the main menu.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the "Back to Menu" button.
